abstract:
\begin{abstract}

\noindent
Canonical quantisation of the free-field zero modes $q$, $p$ on a
half-line $p>0$ provides for WZNW coset theories self-adjoint vertex operators
on account of hidden symmetries generated by an $S$-matrix.

\
